729018f-a.title: Richmond: Hylan Boulevard - Sharrott Road
729018f-a.text:
Hylan Boulevard, south side, east of Sharrott R0ad, showing the Princes Bay Lighthouse. It is situated on a U. S. Government reservation, on the Prinoes Bay shore.
oummer, 1924

729019f-a.title: Richmond: Hylan Boulevard - Sharrott Avenue
729019f-a.text:
Hylan Boulevard, north side, between Sharrott Avenue and Ottilie Street, showing St. Joachimand St. Ann's Roman Gatholic Ghurcn, and the Main Building (left) of Mount Loretto.
1924
P. L. Sperr

Another view of the church and (right) St. Joseph' Asylum
for Blind girls, at a later date.
June 27, 1932.
